title: Chicago West has jumper embroidered with his mum Kim and sister North
text:
Amazing (Picture: Instagram)

Kim Kardashian confirmed that her daughter Chicago did indeed wear a jumper with an embroidered image of Kim and his sister North on it.

Some clever internet sleuths spotted the very extra fashion statement in a video Kim posted of North having a playdate with her cousins True, Dream, and Stormi.

One Twitter user posted the sweater next to the photo next to a zoomed in version of the sweater writing: ‘omg Chicago’s sweater is embroidered with Kim and North on it.’

Kim retweeted and wrote, ‘You guys notice everything!!!’

Go team (Picture: Twitter)

Chicago, who was born in January 2018, is Kim’s second daughter with Kanye West with their first being North so it is very cool that they chose to show off the sister bond like that.

The toddler also has two brothers, Saint and the newest addition to the West clan, Psalm.

Advertisement

Advertisement

The playdate footage marked the first time the toddlers starred in a video together since they were born, according to People.

One user wrote of the playdate: ‘Keeping Up With The Kousins: The Next Jenneration’.

Computer enhance (Picture: Twitter)

The embroidered image on Chicago’s jumper is from 2016 Picture Getty

Kylie Jenner, who is mum to Stormi, also shared a video of the playdate on her Instagram writing: ‘These girls are getting so big I can’t handle it … thank you God for them.’

‘Squad goals,’ True’s mum Khloé Kardashian captioned the same clip on her Instagram Story.

Kim also gave fans an update on her baby boy Psalm on Friday sharing a video of her son to her Instagram.

‘My baby Psalm is getting so big. He started off looking like Chicago but now looks like Saint’s twin!’ she said.

‘Hi cutie! Look at my baby, hi cutie. Hi Psalm,’ Kardashian West told Psalm in the video, in which he moves his mouth while laying on a table. ‘You want to talk so badly!’

description: Kim Kardashian confirmed that her daughter Chicago did indeed wear a jumper with an embroidered image of Kim and sister North on it.
